original_title: Killerjagd. Töte mich, wenn du kannst
overview: A young woman (Alexandra Neldel) begins to work collecting emergency calls when get one that puts she on the trail of a serial murderer who, for some strange reason, she intends to become involved in the case. Furthermore yet another teenager has been kidnapped. Police do not know where to start, but it surely depend to find the victim alive.
title: Killerjagd. Töte mich, wenn du kannst
